title: Hal Chase & John McGraw for sale

posts.post_title: Hal Chase & John McGraw for sale
posts.post_content:
Hal Chase blue portrait Old Mill back - SGC A.  Looks to be slightly trimmed but presents very nicely!

John McGraw portrait with cap, Sweet Cap 350/460 back - SGC 1.5.

Asking $160 each including domestic shipping.  

Will gladly send photos upon request.
